original_title: Solidaridad del pueblo hacia las víctimas del fascismo
overview: A pro-Republican propaganda documentary made during the Spanish Civil War.  It is a report of the demonstration held in Valencia in 1936 in solidarity with those wounded in the war.

production_companies.name: sindicato de la industria del espectáculo (SIE)

title: The People's Solidarity for the Victims of Fascism
